## Load the stop events and ridership data
```{r}
library(readr)
trimet_stop_event_1_30SEP2017 <- read_csv("data/raw/trimet_stop_event 1-30SEP2017.csv",
col_types = cols(SERVICE_DATE = col_datetime(format = "%d%b%Y:%H:%M:%S")))
View(trimet_stop_event_1_30SEP2017)
passenger_census <- read_csv("data/raw/passenger_census.csv",
col_types = cols(SUMMARY_BEGIN_DATE = col_date(format = "%d-%b-%y")))
View(passenger_census)

```
